blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Mr and Mrs Stark-Rogers
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2X75mMe

by Fighting4Fandoms

After Steve travels to Earth-3490 he meets and falls in love with Natasha Stark otherwise known as the female version of Tony Stark. Obviously no one knows this apart from him, still doesn’t mean he doesn’t love his wife any less. They have a 5 year old son, Peter and are expecting another little bundle… who is going to be born any day now.

Words: 1178, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Endgame AU

  • Fandoms: Marvel 3490, Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel (Comics)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Natasha Stark, Steve Rogers, Peter Parker, May Parker, Pepper Potts, Happy Hogan, James “Rhodey” Rhodes
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Natasha Stark, Natasha Stark & Peter Parker, Steve Rogers & Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Childbirth, Married Couple, Married stony, Superfamily, Precious Peter Parker, Kid Peter Parker, Female Tony Stark, Earth-3490, Awesome Pepper Potts, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark Friendship, Protective Steve Rogers


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2X75mMe

summary: [Image not mine, taken from Vector Stock] Tomorrow, that is the 29th of May marks the 49th Birthday of Tony Stark so I have...
body:
[Image not mine, taken from Vector Stock]

Tomorrow, that is the 29th of May marks the 49th Birthday of Tony Stark so I have decided to have a celebration day. Please send in asks for:

  1. Drabble/short fic requests 
  • Can be Tony x Character, Tony x Reader (specific info needed).
  • Dialogue prompt or scenario prompt to be provided 
  1. Mood board requests 
  2. Icon requests 
  3. Head cannon requests 
  4. Or just come into my ask box @lgbtonystarks and fan-girl over Tony with me 

Tagging some mutuals so that this does not fail: @bucket-barn  @my-babies-are-no-longer-ash  @messy-random-bitch  @emilyshurley  @your-villainous-neighbour  @lucifers-favorite-child  @peggy–carter  @smalltonystark  @robertdowney-jr  @locke-writes

My main blog is @kamalahskhan btw so that you all recognize me, I’m zana :)

blog.name: tonystarkisaslut
blog.title: Love You 3000
blog.description:
Grace, 18, American, queer af

My icon was made by the lovely d-inchiostro, and my header is by the marvelous marvelocks.

I ship almost everything, no hate allowed.

If you want me to tag something ask nicely and ofc I will.

Requests and prompts are always open!

summary: Prompt where Peter is an age regressor and only his close friends and May know, it isn’t about kink or even a choice it’s just...
question: Prompt where Peter is an age regressor and only his close friends and May know, it isn’t about kink or even a choice it’s just something he began doing when he got PTSD. He normally has good control of it, but he’s afraid it will happen around Tony who he’s terrified will judge him. He doesn’t want Tony to know. But then one day Peter is overstimulated and anxious and begins to regress. At first Tony doesn’t notice, he’s just trying to calm down Peter, but soon realizes what’s happening.
answer:
The very first time it happens is after Ben dies in front of him. He hadn’t had his powers yet, and he was 13 years old.

He has regressed in age because he heard a gun shot outside, and had ran to May crying.

May didn’t even notice anything was out of the ordinary at first until she realized Peter had wet himself.

Being scared of gunshots after witnessing a gun related death is normal. Wetting your pants isn’t.

May takes him to the doctor and after several tests, several visits, and a referral to a child physiologist, he gets diagnosed with PTSD and a told that he experiences ‘regression’.

May does so much research on it, Peter feels bad. She spends all her free time doing this.

But she tells him everything she knows, and tells him she loves him, and will support him no matter what.

~

At 14, Peter has learned to live with this condition. It comes out when he’s scared, when he’s overly stressed, and when he’s so tired a normal person would start crying.

So he tries to get good sleep, tries to avoid being stressed (as much as being a high schooler will let him) and tries not to be scared.

He’s good at the first two, but he can’t help being scared.

~

When he’s bitten by the spider, it stresses him out, Keeps him awake because his body is changing so much, and scared the hell out of him.

He spent an entire week little, and May had to skip work to take care of him.

When he got big again, he felt so guilty he cried. May told him it wasn’t a problem, that she felt lucky to be able to help him like this.

Peter isn’t 100% sure he believes her… but it does make him feel a little better, at least.

~

It’s been years, now, and most things don’t bother him anymore. He’s learned to turn his stress into motivation, so he’s excited instead. He’s learned how to get enough sleep and patrol at the same time. And he’s learned how to calm himself down when he’s afraid.

He would say he’s doing a pretty damn good job.

He’s 17, and he hasn’t been little in over a year. That had been right after he thought Tony was going to die, because he used the gauntlet on Thanos. Luckily Tony didn’t die, due to a quick blood transfusion from Steve.

May had taken care of him then, and Tony didn’t even notice. He was too busy recovering.

But now, he feels like he’s actually dying.

Anxiety attacks are nothing knew to Tony, so he starts trying to calm him down with those methods.

When it doesn’t work and Peter starts to cry harder, Tony’s doesn’t know what to do.

“Daddy!” Peter sobs and clings to Tony’s leg. “I scawed! I scawed daddy!”

Tony blinks slowly, leaning down and petting Peter’s hair. “It’s ok. I’m here. I’m here.” He sends a text to May. ‘Why is Peter talking like he’s 3?’

‘Oh my god, I’m so sorry! He age regresses, when he’s hurt. Please be nice to him, he has the mind of a 3 year old. He doesn’t know what he’s doing, he isn’t doing it on purpose. Please, please be nice to him. I’ll come get him ASAP.’

Tony shakes his head. ‘I got it, stay at work.’ Tony sends and puts his phone away. “Petey pie? How old are you?”

Peter sniffles and rubs his nose. He looks up at Tony with tear filled eyes. He holds up three finger, rubbing his eye with this other hand.

Tony nods and stands up. “Alright baby boy, what can daddy do to make you feel better?” He asks.

Peter sniffles and hugs Tony. “Cuddles!” He cries. “And- an- an- juice!”

Tony chuckles and nods. “Alright, I’ll go get you some juice. Then you can drink it, and then we can lay down. Okay?”

Peter nods and takes Tony’s hand. “Otay.” He whispers.

~

When May comes to get him, Peter is passed out cold. “I’m so sorry!” She apologizes.

“It’s really okay, he wasn’t any trouble. He just wanted juice and some cuddles, and I already had some juice, so.”

May smiles fondly. “That’s all? Wow, he never calms down that fast.”

Tony shrugs. “Is it okay if he sleeps here? Just for tonight? I can take care of him!”

May smiles in relief and nods. “Yes, please. I have an early shift tomorrow.”

Tony smiles. “I got him.”

He watches her leave, and looks down at sleeping Peter. “I’ve got you.”

reblog.comment:
The very first time it happens is after Ben dies in front of him. He hadn’t had his powers yet, and he was 13 years old.

He has regressed in age because he heard a gun shot outside, and had ran to May crying.

May didn’t even notice anything was out of the ordinary at first until she realized Peter had wet himself.

Being scared of gunshots after witnessing a gun related death is normal. Wetting your pants isn’t.

May takes him to the doctor and after several tests, several visits, and a referral to a child physiologist, he gets diagnosed with PTSD and a told that he experiences ‘regression’.

May does so much research on it, Peter feels bad. She spends all her free time doing this.

But she tells him everything she knows, and tells him she loves him, and will support him no matter what.

~

At 14, Peter has learned to live with this condition. It comes out when he’s scared, when he’s overly stressed, and when he’s so tired a normal person would start crying.

So he tries to get good sleep, tries to avoid being stressed (as much as being a high schooler will let him) and tries not to be scared.

He’s good at the first two, but he can’t help being scared.

~

When he’s bitten by the spider, it stresses him out, Keeps him awake because his body is changing so much, and scared the hell out of him.

He spent an entire week little, and May had to skip work to take care of him.

When he got big again, he felt so guilty he cried. May told him it wasn’t a problem, that she felt lucky to be able to help him like this.

Peter isn’t 100% sure he believes her… but it does make him feel a little better, at least.

~

It’s been years, now, and most things don’t bother him anymore. He’s learned to turn his stress into motivation, so he’s excited instead. He’s learned how to get enough sleep and patrol at the same time. And he’s learned how to calm himself down when he’s afraid.

But now, he feels like he’s actually dying.

When it doesn’t work and Peter starts to cry harder, Tony’s doesn’t know what to do.

Peter sniffles and rubs his nose. He looks up at Tony with tear filled eyes. He holds up three finger, rubbing his eye with this other hand.

Peter sniffles and hugs Tony. “Cuddles!” He cries. “And- an- an- juice!”

Tony chuckles and nods. “Alright, I’ll go get you some juice. Then you can drink it, and then we can lay down. Okay?”

Peter nods and takes Tony’s hand. “Otay.” He whispers.

~

When May comes to get him, Peter is passed out cold. “I’m so sorry!” She apologizes.

“It’s really okay, he wasn’t any trouble. He just wanted juice and some cuddles, and I already had some juice, so.”

May smiles fondly. “That’s all? Wow, he never calms down that fast.”

Tony shrugs. “Is it okay if he sleeps here? Just for tonight? I can take care of him!”

May smiles in relief and nods. “Yes, please. I have an early shift tomorrow.”

Tony smiles. “I got him.”

He watches her leave, and looks down at sleeping Peter. “I’ve got you.”
